name: Diamonds and Demons
description:
Tap on two or more diamonds with the same color to collect them, the task is not that easy when you are constantly being attacked by little monsters and demons! They will mess with your diamonds, destroy them, eat them, turn them into stones, or cast a spell on them!
You have one weapon you can use to fight off those demons! Collect the required number of diamonds and gem each level before your moves ran out and don’t let the monster on the top reach out to your diamonds.
Each level with different challenge and different goal.
